content: Linux on Z and z/TPFg CPCs f. Requires HMC 2.14.1(Driver 36) or newer and various OS fixes (HCD, HCM, IOS, IOCP) g. Requires 2.3 or higher z/OS partition with APAR OA65559 applied, be running on an IBM z16, and Linux on Z and z/TPF also running on IBM z16. Both z16 CPCs require proper firmware level (Bundle S24 or higher). This configuration continues to support stand-alone CF Dynamic I/O activations. Y Y Y Y Y Y Chapter 7. Operating system support 257 7.3.3 Storage connectivity The supported storage connectivity functions for z/OS and z/VM are listed Table 7-6. Table 7-6 Supported storage connectivity functions for z/OS and z/VM Functiona a. PTFs might be required for toleration support or exploitation of IBM z16 features and functions. z/OS V2R5 z/OS V2R4 z/OS V2R3 z/VM V7R3 z/VM V7R2 z/VM V7R1 zHyperLink Read Support for Db2 and VSAM Y Y Yb b.
